description: Sheffield Wednesday defender Max Lowe is expected to miss the rest of the season with a knee injury.
title: Sheffield Wednesday: Max Lowe not expected back this season
title_page: Sheffield Wednesday: Max Lowe not expected back this season - BBC Sport
maintext:
Sheffield Wednesday defender Max Lowe is not expected to play again this season, according to head coach Danny Rohl.
Lowe injured his knee in the first half of the Steel City derby in Wednesday's last game before the international break.
Rohl admits that he does not think the 27-year-old has a chance of playing in any of their final eight Championship games.
"Max Lowe, I think the season is over for him," Rohl told BBC Radio Sheffield. "This is hard.
"It's a shame that we miss him, that's football, but he was a really good signing for us."
